content: Durante il suo giro in Italia, lui ha visitato diverse citt√† famose per la loro bellezza scenica, per esempio Napoli e Firenze.
translations: eng:On his tour of Italy, he visited several cities which are famous for their scenic beauty, for instance, Naples and Flore
